title: Boards Of Canada - Tomorrow's Harvest - Vinyl - FLAC
description:
FIRSTLY: I have a crap internet connection (slow, low end DSL) so please be patient and then help by seeding! Thanks!

Artist/Album Info:
 <a href="
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tomorrow%27s_Harvest" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tomorrow%27s_Harvest</a>

==============================
This is a 4 side (A, B, C, D) FLAC vinyl recording of Boards Of Canada - Tomorrow's Harvest

INFO:

2566 KBit/s
Sample Rate of 96000 Hz
Stereo (of course)
flac 24 bit depth

I recorded this to share, not for convenience. What I mean is there are 4 sides to this album, thus I recorded 4 total times = 4 tracks. If you want to separate the tracks into individual songs then please do so.

I used Audacity, a free open source audio editor. It's pretty basic but good for this sort of thing.

Brand new records and needle were used. This is literally the first play of these records. And I tried to keep all impurities off the records and needle.

Turntable used was a Realistic LAB-500 Fully Automatic Direct Drive connected directly to stereo inputs of my computer. I monitored (listened) to it as it played, so I could hear any problems. 

Overall I'd say really good quality.

Enjoy, Comment, Seed!

================================

Track List for this album:

Side A:

2. Reach For The Dead
3. White Cyclosa
4. Jacquard Causeway

Side B:
1. Telepath
2. Cold Earth
3. Transmisions Ferox
4. Sick Times

Side C:
1. Palace Posy
2. Split Your Infinities
3. Uritual
4. Nothing Is Real
5. Sundown

Side D:
1. New Seeds
2. Come To Dust
3. Semena Mertvykh
